VeneraQCTemplate.Name: DPP - SD
VeneraQCTemplate.TemplateDescription: Digital Production Partnership constraints for Standard Definition content as per DPP v4.1.

Check.rule: min value is greater than zero and decimal value allow upto 2 digit and if max value is not blank and select value is in GB then convert the min and max value and compare them max is always greater than min
if above FileNameValidationCharacter is selected 1 value in multiselect then restrict A-Z and if value second then Restrict value a-z and if 0-9 then restrict 0-9
Level range: 0-255 and Millivolt range: -51.14 to 763.92 and Percentage range: -7.3 to 109.13
